text: == Events == * February 27 – The Dominican Republic gains independence from Haiti. == New Books == * The Luck of Barry Lyndon by William Makepeace Thackeray == Births == *May 22 – Mary Cassatt, American artist (d. 1926) *July 4 – Edmonia Lewis, American sculptor (d. 1907) *August 6 – Alfred, Duke of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha (d. 1900) == Deaths == * June 27 – Joseph Smith, Jr, founder of Mormonismhe was raped and murderd
